    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method sets up the Setup state, with 2 players, a Game instance, and a unit for the UnitHelper
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If setup fails throw Exception.

      • test_select

        public void test_select()
        This method asserts that on valid ModelCountry can be selected by the Setup. When a second country is selected the first should be cleared, and the second one indexed instead.

      • test_autoDistributeCountries

        public void test_autoDistributeCountries()
        This method asserts that the Setup distributes countries between players correctly, and fairly. Where two countries are distributed among two players each player should always recieve one.
